content:
comment about Selune. Succeed in the Persuasion check (17), and she will reveal her true identity - a worshiper of Shar. You will continue to have a few options on how you wish to respond. You can even choose to journey separately. When speaking with Shadowheart at the camp, you will be presented with these dialogue options. There will be more than one opportunity to separate from her.
